desc: Indigenized Face Masks. Handmade, washable, reversible, reusable, 100% Cotton. We use premium cotton recommended by the CDC for breathability and protection. Our masks are handmade by a Metis woman in Abbotsford, British Columbia. They are Indigenous inspired, and culturally appropriate for all.

layout.text: West Coast and Prairie Inspired Masks
Indigenous made, Non-medical Premium Cotton masks
